item.title: ANTLRv4 vs Bison C++ target for SQL parsing
item.description: The envoy L4/L7 network proxy has an extension that can act as a SQL proxy. The library used is based off a parser that is generated using YACC. We compare the performance by generating an ANTLRv4 parser from an SQL grammar. YACC Parser https://github.com/envoyproxy/sql-parser implements the SQL parser used by Envoy proxy. The authors have setup a benchmark using TPC-H1 queries inputs and google benchmark to run the benchmarks ANTLRv4 parser https://github.
